title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Expenditure in million Swiss francs, with a total of 13 data points.
Overall Expenditure in million Swiss francs has increased over the Year
Expenditure in million Swiss francs is gradually constant from 2007 to 2019.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2011.
Max Expenditure in million Swiss francs about 11696.0 was recorded at Year 2019
Min Expenditure in million Swiss francs about 8073.0 was recorded at Year 2011
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Expenditure in million Swiss francs, with a total of 13 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2011 to 2019.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2009 to 2011.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2007 to 2009.
